Instant Pot Duo Crisp

A true multi-tasker that air fries well and replaces several appliances.

Multicooker that pressure cooks, slow cooks, and air fries with a dedicated lid.

View on Amazon

Pros

  • Multiple cooking functions in one appliance
  • Air fries as well as many stand-alone units
  • Saves counter space versus multiple devices

Cons

  • Bulky footprint
  • Air-fry basket is smaller than full pot

Best for

  • Homes that want a multicooker plus air fryer

Not ideal for

  • People who want a simple basket-only fryer
